title: Domestic details
author: Crossrig, David Hume
snippet: On Dec^ 20, 1675, James Home of Greenlawdean, my uncle, having a spe- ciall kindness for me, did grant me a band for 3000 mks., failing heirs of his own body, with the burden of his debts, to be found in my inventure of writs, letter K, Art.
